room_title: Escape room "Mission Sigma VR" by Parallel Universe VR in Los Angeles
review: My kids (8 and 10) are obsessed with this place. Great introduction into the VR fundamentals with a nice and knowledgable staff that help guide the beginners. Very cool experience.

room_title: Escape room "Mission Sigma VR" by Parallel Universe VR in Los Angeles
review: Unlike anything out there. Here, you feel you are a part of the game universe. Try it!

room_title: Escape room "Mission Sigma VR" by Parallel Universe VR in Los Angeles
review: My son had a 10th birthday party here yesterday and all the kids enjoyed ir, Also all the staff is very helpful and assisting us and all the kids during the party. Will definitely recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "ESC Key" by Game the Room in Rohnert Park
review: The Esc Key was so much fun and I can't wait to do the other room! We got the fastest time, let's see if you can beat us!

room_title: Escape room "ESC Key" by Game the Room in Rohnert Park
review: Amazing! As an escape room veteran, I've probably done at least 10 rooms, both of the rooms here were incredible. Both were extremely well designed in terms of the cleverness of the puzzles. ESC Room's puzzles were harder then Skelaton Key's.

room_title: Escape room "ESC Key" by Game the Room in Rohnert Park
review: Great escape experiences! Started with Skeleton Key and enjoyed it so much, we stayed for ESC Key... Still stuck in the land of C.O.L.I.N., we have to admit. Such nice proprietors, great puzzles and very immersive. We will be sure to send others your way! Thanks much!

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by EscapeX Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Great game! We were a group of 10 newbies and it kept us engaged and having fun the entire time.

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by EscapeX Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We had an AMAZING hour in the Escape Room! Our first time doing an escape room and definitely not our last. You really use your brain and the four of us really worked as a team.

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by EscapeX Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We had so much fun doing this with friends and families! Highly recommend Escape X to anyone that is looking for a challenge and great time! Love the theme and storyline, can't wait for what's next!!

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by EscapeX Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Had a great time doing the room. Definitely a challenge and lots of fun. Bring your friends and give it a go.

room_title: Escape room "DeRailed" by Breakout in Tuscaloosa
review: We had such a fun time breaking out! We had a big group of 18 so we split between Hotel Horror and Derailed. The rooms were VERY well done and the people running the rooms do an amazing job! We can't wait to go back and try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "DeRailed" by Breakout in Tuscaloosa
review: Wonderful experience! Went with a group of 8 for derailed and had a blast! Really makes u think and work as a team. Very well put together and the game masters do a wonderful job. Cool location(1920's house). Will be back again!

room_title: Escape room "DeRailed" by Breakout in Tuscaloosa
review: We had such a fun time breaking out! We had a big group of 18 so we split between Hotel Horror & Derailed. The rooms were VERY well done & the people running the rooms do an amazing job! I enjoyed Derailed a lot!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by PanIQ Escape Room Phoenix in Phoenix
review: We completed this room with approx 20-ish minutes on the clock. We are a group of 6 that have completed about 10-15 rooms. We do not think the difficulty rating on this one is appropriate. I would say it's medium difficulty, bordering on easy.It was unique to be split up with your group. It was a fun room and concept even though we felt like it was a little bit easy.Also, finding the spot is a little difficult. It's kind of hidden on the side of the road with a high rolling fence at the entrance to the parking lot.

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by PanIQ Escape Room Phoenix in Phoenix
review: This was really fun. You definitely need a diverse group of friends to do the wild west! It's a fun challenge and we has 12 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by PanIQ Escape Room Phoenix in Phoenix
review: This our first experience with an escape room. Did it with two other couples on date night. Had a blast! We did the kidnapped room. It was a lot of fun, and we were able to escape from the room with nine minutes left, without any hints. Our wives were taken into a separate room and we had to rescue them and then continue all together. Don't want to give any too many details, but it was fun and challenging. The hardest part was that they didn't really tell us anything from the beginning. We just had to figure out what we needed to do. You get locked in a room with no instructions except to get out. A lot of fun, would totally recommend for groups of friends or team building activities for businesses. I was a little worried that you would have to be a genius puzzle solver. The puzzles/riddles/challenges were clever, but solvable. Thanks for a great evening PanIQ Room staff!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by PanIQ Escape Room Phoenix in Phoenix
review: Had a great time! A group of 6 of us went and it was neat that all of us contributed to our escape! I definitely recommend! Can't wait to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by PanIQ Escape Room Phoenix in Phoenix
review: My sister and her husband took us and we did the alien room. We had a blast! I actually thought we were running out of time any minute, but we finished with 12 minutes to spare! I highly recommend this to one and all, but most especially family.

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by PanIQ Escape Room Phoenix in Phoenix
review: We had a great time! There were four of us and each one participated in getting us out with 8 minutes to spare....whew! We did get some helpful hints from our walkie-talkie guide. We're anxious to go back and try to escape another room...makes you really think out of the box!!!Fun time!!!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by PanIQ Escape Room Phoenix in Phoenix
review: It's so much fun! I went with 4 other friends and we had an absolute hoot. So much time and effort has gone into planning these rooms. We did the kidnapped room and got out with 8 minutes to spare. Chan and Jeff were so much fun and helped in whatever way they could. A few of us began dancing after escaping the first room and they commented on the walkie talkies that they enjoyed it. Definitely coming back next time I'm in Phoenix!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by PanIQ Escape Room Phoenix in Phoenix
review: This was the most fun we have had in a really long time! It was very well put together - they had really taken a lot of time with all the details. The challenges were very creative.

room_title: Escape room "Stash House" by Stash House in Los Angeles
review: Very well crafted puzzles. Great time had by all! Original theme and overall great experience.

room_title: Escape room "Stash House" by Stash House in Los Angeles
review: Ok, I've found a new room that is now in my TOP THREE!Stash House is so, so much more than an "escape room". I felt like I was in a movie and the immersion factor was off the charts. This is a perfect experience for a lot of friends (I tend to cap my group at 4), but I love that this experience gets everyone involved at all times. Everything made sense and flowed beautifully.This was the 117th room I've played and words can't begin to describe this whole experience. They've got an awesome thing going here and I'm sure many more reviews will concur. Escape rooms should follow suit of what this company has got going for them.

room_title: Escape room "Stash House" by Stash House in Los Angeles
review: Stash House is probably my favorite escape room so far!! Instead of escaping, the challenge is to find all the drugs in the house and flush them down the toilet before the cops arrive! The puzzles were very challenging and so well crafted! I’d definitely recommend a bigger group of 6-8 or so.

room_title: Escape room "The Cellar" by Key Quest in Los Angeles
review: This is a work in progress, but was good for the price.  The "serial killer" theme was well done and the puzzles are as expected for an escape room.  Without spoilers, they include looking for things with black lights, organizing clues, and opening lock boxes using various clues given to you.This is in an empty birthday party room devoted for the escape room experience, and had a creepy vibe, especially given the halloween party decorations that are part of the puzzle.  This location seems geared to kids, although this was slightly too scary and too hard for most children. The organization says that they have been visiting other escape rooms in Orange County, and are tinkering with and changing things here to make it better and better.  It may be worth it to wait a few months until a new experience is announced.  But for the much lower price compared to other escape rooms, this is worth it if you are in the area.

room_title: Escape room "The Cellar" by Key Quest in Los Angeles
review: We had such a great time at this Escape room.   We were a group of 9 and we were able to finish the quest in under 45 mins. Yes we did use our hints but we still figured it out. We did the room called 'The Cellar'  and it was really fun. We will be doing it again.

room_title: Escape room "The Cellar" by Key Quest in Los Angeles
review: fun

room_title: Escape room "Mafia" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We came to 60out for our yearly team building day and we had so much fun! We got the Hangover room and escaped. It was awesome! Our team consisted of five and none of us have ever done an escape room so we considered this a win! Highly recommend and Victoria was great!

room_title: Escape room "Mafia" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: The Hangover was my 38th room. This room was decorative and set the scene up for the story. It made me feel like I was immersed in the story quite well. The puzzles were actually fun to do and were quick and on a whim type of solving. No real scavenger hunt in here which was nice and towards the end waa my favorite part because of the props we had to use in order to get out. Loved all of it.

room_title: Escape room "Mafia" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We had some minor tech hiccups in this room, but our game master was able to fix things for us quickly. We had to do something physical in this room that we've never done before, which was super cool! It's a pretty tech-heavy room and uses almost all your senses. I don't think there were any traditional lock-key puzzles (though I could be wrong). The end is incredibly clever!

room_title: Escape room "Mafia" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: The set decor is mind blowing. The puzzles are intuitive and fun. Highly recommended. My friend runs an escape room of her own and she had a blast as well.

room_title: Escape room "Mafia" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We did the new Hangover room. It was lots of fun and we really enjoyed it.At first, I was a reluctant Escape Room virgin but I am so glad I gave this a try. The reason I was initially hesitant is because I don't like places where I can't get out, and I don't like being scared. Haunted houses and being mid row in any arena is my nightmare.These games are terrific because they help you work together as a team while tapping into out of the box thinking and communication skills. I look forward to an opportunity to try another escape room.My friends said this was one of the better ones they have been to in LA and Phoenix.

room_title: Escape room "Imprisoned" by Auburn Escape Zones in Auburn
review: This was so fun! We took our kids and we did the "Imprisoned" room. It was a surprise for all 5 of our kids, ranging from 10-15. We really had to work as a team and managed to escape with just a minute to spare! There were smiles the rest of the day and continual praise for the experience!The staff could not be more amazing! I already want to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Imprisoned" by Auburn Escape Zones in Auburn
review: My husband and I just did the imprisoned challenge, and we will definitely be repeat customers. The staff was cheerful and helpful, and the clues they gave were great as well. We were floored by the details that went into our room, and we had a blast trying to keep track of all the clues. The puzzles were the right amount of challenging, and they throw in some fantastic twists that made it even better. We hadn't even left the parking lot before we started planning our next trip back. I can't recommend it enough!

room_title: Escape room "Imprisoned" by Auburn Escape Zones in Auburn
review: We had a group of seven, which included five 13-year-olds, solving the "Imprisoned" room, and it was so great! The staff was very helpful and friendly, from the booking of the room and the party space to the end of the game and clean up. I highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Imprisoned" by Auburn Escape Zones in Auburn
review: I had the chance to visit Auburn Escape Zones with my coworkers. We had a large group so we broke into 2 teams. My team escaped the Prison room. It was so much fun and a great way to work together. They will be changing a few of the rooms soon so there will be new rooms to escape!I highly recommend fir families or friends looking for something to do in Auburn/Opelika!

room_title: Escape room "Imprisoned" by Auburn Escape Zones in Auburn
review: They said the difficulty of the Imprisoned room was "medium," but it was definitely a hard medium. Looking forward to going back and trying another room! Had a lot of fun!

room_title: Escape room "Humana Festum" by The Basement in Los Angeles
review: I did the new Humana Experience two days ago, which includes 4 mini escapes + 2 tacos and 2 cocktails with each ticket (more can be purchased). I've done two other rooms in the past (which are AMAZING), but the new Humana Experience was so much fun...and less stressful due to the drinks and social time. Have a drink, solve a room...eat a taco and have another drink...try another room, etc. etc. etc. Best of all, on Humana night, you can keep trying until you solve! Also, as always the actors are phenomenal! My boyfriend and I beat all the mini-rooms, so in addition to winning little trinkets, you get 20% off your next booking, which has to be purchased on the spot...and we did! I think we'll go for the Elevator Shaft next!You ROCK The Basement, and best of all you're only 7 minutes from my house!

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Locked Away Escapes in Jonesboro
review: Great for our party of 6! So much more than I expected! We did the Attic themed room! They did a really good job on the puzzles, clues, and tricky locks! We loved it!

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Locked Away Escapes in Jonesboro
review: We did The Attic. It was great! The best time I've had in a while!

room_title: Escape room "The Attic" by Locked Away Escapes in Jonesboro
review: Finally got to do a room out here! We did The Attic. Fantastic room. We escaped (probably with a little help :) ) but we did escape. The detail was amazing and puzzles were very fun. If you haven't done The Attic yet, you need to before it gets replaced with something else!

room_title: Escape room "Submarine Survival" by Breakout Games - Birmingham in Birmingham
review: Holy cow! This was the most fun I have ever had! We tested the new Submarine escape and you could tell that a lot of blood, sweat, and tears was put into this game. I didn't think I'd be as excited when we beat it, but I was thrilled! Thanks Breakout Birmingham, we loved it!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: We were held hostage after a plane crash. Alexis was such a sweet guide. She blindfolded and handcuffed us, and helped anytime we asked. Lol. She was all smiles. Great time!!! I highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: A group of 6 of us did the Hostage room, it was a lot of fun and challenging but we escaped! The staff were friendly, I'd like to go back and try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: Did my first game with 6 buddies and it was a blast! We did the hostage room and barely finished in 56 minutes. The young lady at the counter was super nice and helpful and our game master was super helpful without ruining the experience by giving too much info! We’ll definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: Absolutely loved our experience!! We broke out of Operation: Casino and Hostage. Our two game masters, Alexa and Kristin, were wonderful! They added to our experience and fun!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: My mom, my sister and I went for our first time over Christmas break. We had a blast! We broke out of the Hostage game. It was one of the more difficult ones, but we had so much fun working together to try to escape. I would recommend going to Breakout for any event!

room_title: Escape room "Disco Fever!" by Escape Rooms Mesa in Phoenix
review: This is an AWESOME way to spend an evening!  Played the time travel room first and had so much fun with Braden as our game master that we came back the next night to play the boogie room!  This as with any escape room, some things in the room didn't always work as planned and Braden did such a good job making sure it didn't trip us up.  Plus, when we got stuck and asked for one of our 3 "free" clues, he was great at giving us just the right push to get past what was blocking us.  Disco was super challenging, with clues that weren't logical to find, we definitely needed all 3 freebies plus our extra 10 minutes & clues.  But loved the multi-room adventure!

room_title: Escape room "The Pearled Pachyderm" by Phoenix Puzzle Room in Phoenix
review: Such a fun activity with family and friends! Normally I'm not a lover of trying to figure out puzzles, but the Pearled Pachyderm was a great time with my kids. Would HIGHLY recommend to anyone. Can't wait to go again.

room_title: Escape room "The Pearled Pachyderm" by Phoenix Puzzle Room in Phoenix
review: I have been to 3 escape the room-type establishments, and while the other 2 have been good, this one is leagues above the rest. My partner and I did The Pearled Pachyderm. It was just the two of us. The room was set up in such a way that flowed and felt like it made sense, rather than just collecting random letters, numbers and keys. The story, while minimal, made all the puzzle solving feel a little cooler. I liked the hint system as well. We only used one but they gave us a perfect hint that didn't tell us too much but got us out of our mental block. I can't wait to come back and do another!

room_title: Escape room "The Pearled Pachyderm" by Phoenix Puzzle Room in Phoenix
review: This was amazingly fun! I went with a group of 8 friends and we conquered the Pearled Pachyderm with 11 minutes to spare! I'm happy to say that it was challenging mentally even with 8 adults working on the clues together. If you like problem-solving then this is definitely a must try. Can't wait to go back and do the second room!

room_title: Escape room "The Pearled Pachyderm" by Phoenix Puzzle Room in Phoenix
review: Amazing experience. Loads of fun.The pearled pachyderm is what we solved and it was really well written.Thanks for a fun afternoon!

room_title: Escape room "The Pearled Pachyderm" by Phoenix Puzzle Room in Phoenix
review: I love escape rooms. We did the pearled pachyderm. It was fun. We had 5 people and managed to solve it with one or two hints.

room_title: Escape room "VR: Mission I" by Red Door Escape Room in Sacramento
review: I love this place! Amazing detail put into the design and layout of the rooms!! There are 5 rooms and 3 VR games available and I can't wait to work my way through all of them!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Becoming Houdini" by Puzzling Escape in Phoenix
review: We spent the evening escaping from the Houdini room! My team of seven were warmly welcomed to a clean and friendly lobby. Our game master Janey was fun and professional! When we beat the room record she was excited with us. The overall experience was awesome! The room itself was a 9/10 difficulty and it was pretty complex. We’re fairly experienced escapists and this room was truly difficult. I totally recommend Puzzling Escape!

room_title: Escape room "The Shed" by Dare To Escape AZ in Phoenix
review: the rooms are fun and challenging and the employees are awesome!

room_title: Escape room "The Shed" by Dare To Escape AZ in Phoenix
review: So much Fun and well crafted rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Shed" by Dare To Escape AZ in Phoenix
review: Great experience. Most definitely will go back!

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: The Zodiac room was everything. Staff was very nice and very clear about rules. Extremely fun, the setup of the room really puts you in the atmosphere of the story behind it.

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: Oh I have been looking forward to this room for awhile! I volunteered to be the first victim in, and was rewarded by being handcuffed down. Be warned there's a lot of blood and it has a definite creep factor. These puzzles were not as challenging mentally, but because of the handcuffs and clear physical limitations, proved to be pretty difficult to finally escape.

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac" by Room Escape Los Angeles in Los Angeles
review: I did the Zodiac room with my girlfriends and had so much fun! I would definitely recommenced it if you like horror and scary and interactive! I was thoroughly impressed by this room and the puzzles involved! Also our game master Danny was so funny and sweet and cute! I cannot wait to come back and do their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Hollywood Dreams" by Escape Room Long Beach in Los Angeles
review: My friends and I had a really great time! I have done several escape rooms in the LA area and this by far was the most creative and challenging. You can tell they put alot of energy into creating a fun and exciting atmosphere. Great job guys!

room_title: Escape room "Hollywood Dreams" by Escape Room Long Beach in Los Angeles
review: Tried the easiest one and failed. Will return to pick up where we left off.They would of showed us the solution but we said save it we will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Thief" by beat60 in Gadsden
review: We absolutely loved our experience here! We had booked The Captain, and loved it so much we stayed and did The Jewel Thief! Honestly, if we had the time that day, we probably would have gone ahead and done The Darkness! It's a great addition to the Gadsden area. Thank you so much for bringing this experience to Gadsden!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Thief" by beat60 in Gadsden
review: Had a great time with the kids trying to solve The Jewel and The Captain. These games are well designed and so entertaining! The Captain is very challenging! Definitely need your thinking cap on this one! Highly recommend Beat 60!!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Thief" by beat60 in Gadsden
review: Very laid back place! We tried "The Jewel Thief" and it was definitely challenging but fun.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This room is definitely challenging. I went with a group of 6 and I felt like I wasn't doing anything in certain parts of this room because there was no space for me. I admit that some of the puzzles I could not figure out but luckily for me my teammates were really smart about this. I would recommend this room for anyone who is looking for a challenge because this room definitely got me thinking a lot.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I did the Da Vinci room with my friends last night and had a blast. This room is extremely challenging and sooooooo good. The puzzles felt really unique and the decor was top notch. Plus, if you finish under the time limit with 2 clues or less you get a prize. Sheryl was our game master and she was super helpful and nice. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Just did the Da Vinci room and it's excellent. The puzzles are very challenging but never unfair. Some of them are pretty ingenious and they all stuck with the theme very well. Basically if you want to feel like Tom Hanks in the Da Vinci Code but without the awkward mullet, this is the place to go. I did this with 6 other experienced escapees and we still got out right at the 75 minute mark (or so the game master Sheryl tells us. She definitely played up the drama and was very helpful overall). I'm looking forward to trying the two other rooms at this location.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I recently did the Da Vinci room with my friends and it was easily one of the best rooms I've ever done.  I thought the 75 minutes might feel too long but it was perfect considering the huge amounts of amazing/difficult puzzles which perfectly fit the theme of the room. Sheryl was definitely one of the best game masters I've ever had at any escape room I've been to.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This is a beautiful room but it is really hard. Since the puzzles are so different, it took us some time to understand what to do. We spent a lot of times on puzzles we thought we could solve faster. I don't even think 75 minutes is enough time to get through this but there are plenty of others who have finished this room within that time frame. We had a group of 6 and when time ran out we were told we still had a few more puzzles to complete. Even though I am salty about the loss, I still highly recommend this room to the seasoned escape room goer.

room_title: Escape room "Da Vinci's Secret" by 60out Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We have done about a dozen escape rooms (from 60out as well as a couple other companies) and this is honestly the hardest room that I have ever done. The room had tons of unique puzzles, not just lock and key. I don't even think 75 minutes is enough time to solve all of the puzzles. Even though we got tons of hints we were unable to escape. Despite this, we still had a lot of fun. I would recommend Da Vinci for escape room pros and bigger groups (maybe 4-6 people) so that each person can work on different puzzles at the same time.

room_title: Escape room "Doll House V.2" by PuzzleMazement in Los Angeles
review: We did the "Doll House"! This was our 6th Escape Room, and it was easily one of the best! This is the only one I have ever done that had 3 different levels of rooms that needed to be cleared. It was like unwrapping a present to find another present that needed to be unwrapped, and I loved that! The back story was creepy, but fun...which added its own special element to the whole experience! Jake was an excellent host, and I am excited to go back to try another room! Definitely money well spent!

room_title: Escape room "Doll House V.2" by PuzzleMazement in Los Angeles
review: Great fun doing the doll house! We had a group of 9 girls and the puzzles were challenging, creative, and fun to solve. Highly recommend this for a group.

room_title: Escape room "Doll House V.2" by PuzzleMazement in Los Angeles
review: It was amazing! First time doing one and Ariel really helped a lot! She was able to guide us through some beginner rooms. We did 2 rooms, Dr. S (a steam punk room) and the doll house. Doll house was 3 stories and with 8 people we were able to make it with a minute to spare! Great team building exercise and super fun. Especially for the price. Definitely going to be doing more in the future.

room_title: Escape room "The Dark Sector" by North Valley Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Give this place a 100% approval!! Friendly, knowledgeable, helpful, and best of all FUN!! Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "The Dark Sector" by North Valley Escape Room in Phoenix
review: Visited the North Valley Escape Room with our out of town guests. We had an amazing time! It was so much fun for all. We have done other escape rooms across the Valley and this is by far the best!

room_title: Escape room "The Dark Sector" by North Valley Escape Room in Phoenix
review: This was the first time we had ever done this and it was so much fun. Somebody had told us this one was the best in the area and we were glad she did. A great experience. My only criticism was that we were told all the clues we had missed and if they hadn't told us we would probably do the same one again. A missed opportunity for more business.

room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Basement" by Unlocked Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Best escape room ever! Had such a blast!! And the owners are great! We did the Professor's Basement and we will definitely be back to do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Basement" by Unlocked Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Excellent escape room! We did The Professor's Basement - challenging puzzles (but not overwhelmingly so), great set up and production value, and wonderful staff. Had a fantastic time!

room_title: Escape room "The Professor's Basement" by Unlocked Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: This place is fantastic! Our family came here and did the Professors Basement and had such a great time we came back and did the Sheriff's Office. Both rooms were so much fun for all of my family and we all contributed and haven't stopped talking about how fun it was. We are hooked on escape rooms now and Dave and the team here at UNLOCKED are great and have amazing customer service and really enjoy with they are doing here which makes it that much more fun. They gave us great hints and really kept the fun going! You really need to check this place out if is so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Queen" by Escape Long Beach in Orange County
review: Fantastic. Really tested us. That was a blast!

room_title: Escape room "The Queen" by Escape Long Beach in Orange County
review: This was my first experience with an escape room and I had a blast trying to escape the Queen. The host was very helpful and explained the process nicely. The theme of the room was super fun! Highly recommend and I look forward to escaping the Lab next.

room_title: Escape room "Wanted in the West" by Brainy Actz in Los Angeles
review: This was hands down my favorite escape room that I have done.  I started doing escape rooms a couple months ago, but this one totally went beyond my expectations.  6 of us did the room, Wanted in the West, which was recommended by the sales rep for first timers.  We finished the room in about 40 minutes with no hints!  The puzzles were fun and challenging while still being reasonable.  The room was super duper cool, well set up, and kept us on our toes.  We had some trouble with payment, but everyone was very helpful in getting it all taken care of.  The staff was kind and friendly.  The overall experience was five stars, and I hope to do more rooms like this one!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Mountain Room Escapes in Big Bear City
review: This was a great fun place for a family to work together. The hostess made it fun and we escaped with 13 minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Mountain Room Escapes in Big Bear City
review: This is my 8th escape room with my friends and we did the Cabin escape. The puzzles were very well made and intuitive. The room had a very nice eerie feel. There were no jumpscares but it had many psychological scares.

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Katelyn or K$ was an awesome host. today for team building 7 of us tried this for the first time ever. Some clues were harder than others and a few hints along the way but we all worked together and escaped.

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Such a fun and exciting experience! It was a nail biter to the end, making it out with only 16 seconds to spare. My group did the Locker room and it was challenging and required all of our combined effort. Definitely would recommend to anyone in the Palm Springs area. Shoutout to our room assistant Lyssa, she was fantastic and helpful when we needed!

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: We had so much fun with the bank heist we decided to do the locker room. Both rooms had great hosts. The locker room victim played the part well.When we return to the desert we will do the others.Definitely a good time.

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Had a great time with my family an Em was great to work with. We were able to escape the locker room. Can't wait to go back and do another escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: We have done over 30 escape rooms and we had a great time escaping the Locker Room. Cristina (OG) our game master was great, our kids (11-year-old twins) liked the room and we escaped with almost 7 min left.We will be back for sure to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Locker Room" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
review: Escape Room was fun for the whole family. Our group of 9 had a great time working together to solve the Locker Room puzzles. Everyone was engaged and played a part in our escape success. It was challenging and the mind bending puzzle promoted team work and outside the box thinking. We all had a part in our successful escape. The hints they gave along the way were thought promoting and helpful without being obvious. Martha, our "hostage" was a critical part of solving the puzzle. Our family thoroughly enjoyed the experience and we'll be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: Went yesterday as a group of four friends. The most fun I've had in a couple of years on an outing! We did the Kidnapping and broke out in 56 minutes. If you want a challenge and an outright rush of adrenaline, I highly suggest doing these games! The staff was great as well. Overall a thrill!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: We had a great time being Kidnapped! Staff was friendly, the facility was nice, room was neat and the clues were interesting and challenging. Met our expectations and we can't wait to go back to try out the other scenarios.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: Excellent outing!! Kidnapping was very challenging. I'm amazed we made it out!! Will definitely be back to try a different room!!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: We came to play the breakout games as a group activity with my coworkers. It is an excellent team building activity! It was soooo much fun. We did the kidnapping but I'm already planning a visit back for a different game!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Mobile in Mobile
review: A great atmosphere! The kidnapping was super fun, and the staff helped us out along the way! Will definitely be back trying all the different rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Overbrook Asylum" by Xcape Flagstaff in Flagstaff
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Undercover Alley" by Breakout Games - Birmingham in Birmingham
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Private Eye" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Great EscapeRoom! We escaped, really fun!!! I recommend this for all ages! Affordable and very exiting!!! You can win a free game by spinning a roulette!!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Private Eye" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Awesome escape room! Definitely recommend! A bunch of rooms to choose from! We had a blast and solved it with 2 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Private Eye" by Chronos Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: Great experience! Definitely recommend if you're looking for a challenge! They have so many rooms can't wait to do them all!

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Fox in a Box Orange County in Orange County
review: Looks small and simple but the tasks can be very difficult at some points. You really need to use teamwork. My friends and I had a blast and had 4 seconds remaining in the Cold War Bunker. It was crazy!

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Fox in a Box Orange County in Orange County
review: Played the Bunker room at this location and it was my first time ever playing this kind of game, had an awesome time trying to solve the various themed puzzles all around the room. This would be Ideal with 4-5 people when you experience the rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Fox in a Box Orange County in Orange County
review: We saved the world from a nuclear meltdown! Our group had a lot of fun. The room was incredible and totally immersive. Definitely coming back to do the other two rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Cold War Bunker" by Fox in a Box Orange County in Orange County
review: What a blast! We had a great time experiencing our first escape room as family. With 3 minutes left, we were able to disable the nuclear warhead. I loved the fact that each of us brought different skills and observations to help figure out the clues. I can't wait to go back and experience the other rooms. Jackson was a great host!

room_title: Escape room "Disarmed" by Exit Strategies in Redding
review: The Idea was good but the lighting was very soft. Not recommended for older people as my grandparents had the worst time because of the lighting

room_title: Escape room "Disarmed" by Exit Strategies in Redding
review: Our group had such a blast trying to figure out the "Disarmed" room. I recommend this for a fun night out with family or friends.

room_title: Escape room "Disarmed" by Exit Strategies in Redding
review: Super fun and challenging, we blew up! (oops) But we want to do it again asap!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Limitless Escape Games in Modesto
review: None

room_title: Escape room "The Deadly Double Agent" by Arkansas Escape Rooms in Little Rock
review: Had a great time in the "double agent" room! Look forward to coming back and trying the other rooms. Bring your friends and try it out! It is awesome!

room_title: Escape room "The Deadly Double Agent" by Arkansas Escape Rooms in Little Rock
review: Tried out the Double Agent room and it was difficult in a fun way! There were multiple puzzles that I've never seen before! Will be back for other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by All Locked Up in Los Angeles
review: A group of friends and I tried the Garage and we left thoroughly satisfied with our experience. We weren't expecting to find such a gem in such a quiet location especially considering there isn't much to do in Canyon Country, but we couldn't have had more fun. We will definitely be coming back to try out the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by All Locked Up in Los Angeles
review: My daughter has been telling me she wanted to go to an escape room for the last few months. I finally booked our first experience at All Locked Up. We made it a family night and had a terrific game in The Garage. We will definitely be back. Thank you so much for the fun evening.

room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by All Locked Up in Los Angeles
review: This was my first experience with Escape Rooms...and I totally LOVED it.  They built a legit Garage complete with a regulation garage door, all inside their facility.  There were some surprises I did not expect at all, and I don't want to give anything away, but it was a blast collaborating with my family and friends.  I totally want to do it again, so I can't wait for them to build out their others rooms.  They had lockers to stash your stuff and they provide a keyed lock that you keep on your possession so you know your stuff is safe.It was nice to have something like this in Canyon Country.  Shout out to Betitos next door if you love Mexican food.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Save Christmas" by Exodus Escape Adventures in Sacramento
review: Our family had such a great time in the Christmas Escape room. Very creative & FUN!!Thank you for a wonderful experience!!

room_title: Escape room "Terminator 2 Escape" by Escape Westgate in Phoenix
review: Super fun and exciting!! Gone to two of the rooms, gotten out both times on some sort of luck hahah! Definitely recommend

room_title: Escape room "Terminator 2 Escape" by Escape Westgate in Phoenix
review: Highly recommend the Terminator II room!  Great problem solving puzzles for the youngster and the more mature.  Check out the T-1000!  So AWESOME!

room_title: Escape room "Terminator 2 Escape" by Escape Westgate in Phoenix
review: My team from work came here for a team builder, and we had a blast! Did T2 and although it was difficult at times, we were able to save humanity with about 5 minutes to spare! Thank you for providing a fun at times stressful 55 minutes of an exciting time! We'll definitely be back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Inside Area 51" by Back in Time Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I did the Area 51 room with a small group of friends from work. We are a moderately experienced escape room group, and we found this room to be quite difficult. We needed several hints to make progress but we were finally able to get out of the room. If you love puzzles and a tough challenge and have a few buddies with similar mindsets, this is a great place for you!

room_title: Escape room "Inside Area 51" by Back in Time Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I really enjoyed my experience at these escape rooms. They were thoughtful and I think on par with the ones I've tried before. If you are going to do one, try Area 51! That one is amazing and takes extreme teamwork to get through it. Try it! It's a lot of work for your brain but it's also a lot of fun. I definitely recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "Inside Area 51" by Back in Time Escape Rooms in Los Angeles
review: So much fun! I did both Salem and Area 51 in one weekend. Although my team didn't make the 60 minute mark for Area 51, they were kind enough to give us more time to finish up and escape. Very excited for their upcoming rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Ctrl + Alt + Reality" by Planet Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: I had a good time if you like to solve things this is the place for you highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Ctrl + Alt + Reality" by Planet Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: If you want a little challenge Try out CTRL+Alt+Realty. Well designed room by a talented team. super fun

room_title: Escape room "Ctrl + Alt + Reality" by Planet Escape Room in Los Angeles
review: So fun! Incredibly detailed ambiance. Puzzles where difficult but host helped us work our way through. Tons of fun and highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "It's Mine" by Avalanche Escape Rooms in Anchorage
review: None

room_title: Escape room "Chasm" by Beat the Room in Sacramento
review: We had 6 family members working together and having a great time! It was a first for all but one of us. We all loved it and will definitely come again 😎

room_title: Escape room "Chasm" by Beat the Room in Sacramento
review: I want to go again try other rooms thanks to my sister in- law for the invite fun family and friend get together
